argumentText:
ARGUMENT
r s

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | igenval.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 2 |  | igenval.2 | |- X = ran G |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_rngoidl | |- ( R e. RingOps -> X e. ( Idl ` R ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_sseq2 | |- ( j = X -> ( S C_ j <-> S C_ X ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_rspcev | |- ( ( X e. ( Idl ` R ) /\ S C_ X ) -> E. j e. ( Idl ` R ) S C_ j ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ S C_ X ) -> E. j e. ( Idl ` R ) S C_ j ) |
| 7 |  | #P_rabn0 | |- ( { j e. ( Idl ` R ) | S C_ j } =/= (/) <-> E. j e. ( Idl ` R ) S C_ j ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ S C_ X ) -> { j e. ( Idl ` R ) | S C_ j } =/= (/) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_intex | |- ( { j e. ( Idl ` R ) | S C_ j } =/= (/) <-> |^| { j e. ( Idl ` R ) | S C_ j } e. _V ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_sylib | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ S C_ X ) -> |^| { j e. ( Idl ` R ) | S C_ j } e. _V ) |
| 11 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 1st ` R ) e. _V |
| 12 | 1, 11 | #P_eqeltri | |- G e. _V |
| 13 | 12 | #P_rnex | |- ran G e. _V |
| 14 | 2, 13 | #P_eqeltri | |- X e. _V |
| 15 | 14 | #P_elpw2 | |- ( S e. ~P X <-> S C_ X ) |
| 16 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( r = R /\ s = S ) -> r = R ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( r = R /\ s = S ) -> ( Idl ` r ) = ( Idl ` R ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_sseq1 | |- ( s = S -> ( s C_ j <-> S C_ j ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( r = R /\ s = S ) -> ( s C_ j <-> S C_ j ) ) |
| 20 | 17, 19 | #P_rabeqbidv | |- ( ( r = R /\ s = S ) -> { j e. ( Idl ` r ) | s C_ j } = { j e. ( Idl ` R ) | S C_ j } ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_inteqd | |- ( ( r = R /\ s = S ) -> |^| { j e. ( Idl ` r ) | s C_ j } = |^| { j e. ( Idl ` R ) | S C_ j } ) |
| 22 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( 1st ` r ) = ( 1st ` R ) ) |
| 23 | 22, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( r = R -> ( 1st ` r ) = G ) |
| 24 | 23 | #P_rneqd | |- ( r = R -> ran ( 1st ` r ) = ran G ) |
| 25 | 24, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( r = R -> ran ( 1st ` r ) = X ) |
| 26 | 25 | #P_pweqd | |- ( r = R -> ~P ran ( 1st ` r ) = ~P X ) |
| 27 |  | #P_df-igen | |- IdlGen = ( r e. RingOps , s e. ~P ran ( 1st ` r ) |-> |^| { j e. ( Idl ` r ) | s C_ j } ) |
| 28 | 21, 26, 27 | #P_ovmpt2x | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ S e. ~P X /\ |^| { j e. ( Idl ` R ) | S C_ j } e. _V ) -> ( R IdlGen S ) = |^| { j e. ( Idl ` R ) | S C_ j } ) |
| 29 | 15, 28 | #P_syl3an2br | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ S C_ X /\ |^| { j e. ( Idl ` R ) | S C_ j } e. _V ) -> ( R IdlGen S ) = |^| { j e. ( Idl ` R ) | S C_ j } ) |
| 30 | 10, 29 | #P_mpd3an3 | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ S C_ X ) -> ( R IdlGen S ) = |^| { j e. ( Idl ` R ) | S C_ j } ) |
